P001345.project_name: Protected Areas and Wildlife Services Project

project_abstract.cdata: The project finances institutional strengthening, training, civil works, vehicles, equipment, and some incremental operating costs over a five-year implementation period.  It comprises the following components: (a) development of Kenya Wildlife Service's (KWS) institutional capacity; (b) rehabilitation of park and reserve infrastructure; (c) establishment of a Community Wildlife Program; (d) expansion of the wildlife education program; (e) strengthening of Kenya Wildlife Service's (KWS) planning capacity; (f) revitalization of Kenya Wildlife Service's (KWS) scientific research; and lastly, (g) maintenance of the effectiveness of the Wildlife Protection Unit.
